divs: sighting detailsmy and my gf were outside smoking a cigarette when we saw a glowing orange object. it moved slowly headed east. we've never seen a flying object like this. we live around edwards afb and the lockheed skunkworks\plant 42.it was too slow to be a plane and too circular to be a helicopter. it made no noise. we watched it until it faded away off in the distance.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Lancaster
There were no other sightings in Lancaster on or around August 12th 2011
